EmailTemplate.name: (crd) Can't Read documents
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for sending us your verification documents! Unfortunately, the images are unreadable. Could you please upload clearer images to your account so we can complete the verification process?
Thanks for your help!
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} BorrowLenses.com Verifications Team Verify@borrowlenses.com (844) 853-6737 x4
